description:
Support this Channel on Patreon and get access to Patron-only content, music, stems, libraries and more.
https://patreon.com/yuriwong

Check out my latest Circuit Tracks pack (Operation_1): https://isotonikstudios.com/product/operation_1-by-yuri-wong/
btw there's a free edition on my Patreon :)

Smpltrek Skin by Cremacaffe
https://cremacaffe.shop/products/smpltrek

This video explores the musical usage of Sonicware's Smpltrek vs the Teenage Engineering KO-II or EP-133. Both are decent budget samplers for creatively exploring sampling and both are capacle of creating interesting songs with. I'd like to explore both devices from a musicmaking point of view, rather than just doing a feature-by-feature comparison.

Chapters:
00:00 Intro
00:49 Quick Summary
01:11 Polyphony
01:58 Sample Storage & Organisation
02:32 Memory Storage
03:24 Power Requirements
04:03 Editing Notes
04:39 Audio Interface
05:20 Form Factor
05:56 Effects
06:40 Stem Export
07:20 Pads
07:49 Screens
08:29 Conclusion & Re
title: Battle Of The Budget Samplers: Sonicware Smpltrek vs Teenage Engineering EP-133 KO-II
